translation.en: [FAA traffic controller] American 11, heavy traffic's orbiting north of the field at 3,500 feet,
translation.zh:
‎美航11号 机场北空3500英尺
‎有大量盘旋活动

translation.en: maintain 3,000, runway four right.
translation.zh:
‎请保持3000英尺
‎右侧第四条跑道

translation.en: Cleared for takeoff.
translation.zh: ‎允许起飞

translation.en: [woman] What a beautiful, beautiful Tuesday morning it was.
translation.zh: ‎那个周二早上原本很美好

translation.en: The sky was clear, it was blue, not a cloud in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎天空晴朗 是蓝色的 空中没有云彩

translation.en: They call it "severe clear."
translation.zh: ‎可以称之为“非常晴朗”

translation.en: About eight o'clock, American Flight 11 was fully fueled.
translation.zh:
‎大概八点钟左右
‎美国航空11号航班加满了油

translation.en: It was bound for Los Angeles.
translation.zh: ‎那趟航班准备飞往洛杉矶

translation.en: It left Boston Logan Airport. We know it was hijacked.
translation.zh:
‎它离开了波士顿洛根机场
‎我们得知它被劫持了

translation.en: [FAA man] American 11, climb maintain level three five zero.
translation.zh: ‎美航11号 请升至35000英尺

translation.en: American 11, climb maintain level three five zero.
translation.zh: ‎美航11号 请升至35000英尺

translation.en: American 11, Boston.
translation.zh: ‎美航11号 波士顿

translation.en: [FAA man 2] This is Athens.
translation.zh: ‎这里是雅典

translation.en: [FAA man] This is Boston, I turned American 20 left. I was gonna climb him,
translation.zh:
‎这里是波士顿
‎美航20号 左转准备爬升

translation.en: he will not respond to me now at all.
translation.zh: ‎它现在完全没有回应我

translation.en: [FAA man 2] Looks like he's turning right.
translation.zh: ‎它像是在向右转

translation.en: [Bouchat] Traffic controllers lost contact,
translation.zh: ‎航空管制员失联

translation.en: but the hijackers used the Hudson River as its guide down to New York City.
translation.zh:
‎但劫机者利用哈德逊河作为参考
‎向南飞往纽约市 ‎（美东夏令时 上午8:19）

translation.en: [Ong] Number Three in the back. The cockpit's not answering.
translation.zh:
‎我是三号 现在正在后舱
‎驾驶舱没有回应

translation.en: Somebody's stabbed in business class.
translation.zh: ‎公务舱有人被刺伤

translation.en: And I think there's Mace that we can't breathe.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得机舱内有毒气
‎我们无法呼吸

translation.en: I don't know. I think we're getting hijacked.
translation.zh: ‎我不清楚 我觉得我们被劫持了

translation.en: [man] What is your name?
translation.zh: ‎你叫什么名字？

translation.en: [Ong] Okay. My name is Betty Ong.
translation.zh: ‎我叫邓月薇

translation.en: I'm Number Three on Flight 11.
translation.zh: ‎我是11号航班上三号乘务员

translation.en: Our first class passengers are--
translation.zh: ‎我们头等舱的乘客…

translation.en: Our first class galley flight attendant, and our purser has been stabbed.
translation.zh:
‎我们头等舱乘务员和乘务长
‎已经被刺伤了

translation.en: And we can't get to the cockpit, the door won't open.
translation.zh:
‎我们无法进入驾驶舱
‎舱门无法打开

translation.en: [woman] Have you guys called anyone else?
translation.zh: ‎你们联系过其他人吗？

translation.en: [Ong] No. Somebody's calling medical and we can't get a doc--
translation.zh:
‎没有 ‎有人呼叫医疗服务
‎但我们找不到医生…

translation.en: In 2001, I was working in the World Trade Center
translation.zh: ‎2001年 我在世界贸易中心上班

translation.en: in the South Tower, Tower 2.
translation.zh: ‎南塔 2号楼

translation.en: I was located on the 101st.
translation.zh: ‎办公室在101层

translation.en: We were there about four or five years, I think, in that building.
translation.zh: ‎我们在那栋大楼里工作了四五年

translation.en: I started working at the hotel in 1981.
translation.zh: ‎我从1981年开始在这家酒店工作

translation.en: It was called Vista International
translation.zh: ‎这里以前叫做维斯塔国际酒店

translation.en: and then it became Marriott International Hotel.
translation.zh: ‎后来变成了万豪国际酒店

translation.en: I was hotel engineer. Basically maintained the whole building.
translation.zh:
‎我是酒店的工程师
‎主要负责维护整栋大楼

translation.en: And on the morning of September 11,
translation.zh: ‎9月11日早上

translation.en: I arrived there about six o'clock, as I usually do.
translation.zh: ‎我六点左右到了 和平常一样

translation.en: Usually about eight o'clock, we have departmental meetings,
translation.zh: ‎我们一般在八点开部门会议

translation.en: which is a brief meeting of what's going to be on the agenda for the day.
translation.zh: ‎简短地介绍一下当日工作安排

translation.en: And for this particular meeting, my boss told us
translation.zh: ‎那次会议上 领导告诉我们说

translation.en: that there were some guests that was staying at the hotel,
translation.zh: ‎住在酒店的几位客人

translation.en: and they had some issues with their room.
translation.zh: ‎她们的房间有些问题

translation.en: My boss wanted us to really focus on these two guests.
translation.zh: ‎领导让我们特别注意两位客人

translation.en: The two ladies, their names were Faye and Leigh Gilmore, from Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎来自芝加哥的两位女士
‎名字叫做法耶和利·吉尔莫

translation.en: Leigh had MS.
translation.zh: ‎利患有多发性硬化症

translation.en: It was very crippling to her.
translation.zh: ‎她的残疾状况比较严重

translation.en: That confined her to a wheelchair.
translation.zh: ‎只能坐轮椅

translation.en: [Frederick] She advocated for people who had disabilities.
translation.zh: ‎她为残障人士倡导权益

translation.en: And I told my boss that I would go to the room
translation.zh:
‎我告诉领导说
‎我之后会去她的房间

translation.en: and make sure that the guest was happy and make sure the guest had everything they needed for that day.
translation.zh:
‎确保客人满意
‎满足她们当天的需求

translation.en: [man] American Airlines Emergency line, please state your emergency.
translation.zh:
‎美国航空紧急电话
‎请说明你的紧急情况

translation.en: [woman] Hey. This is Nydia at American Airlines calling.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我是美国航空的尼迪亚

translation.en: I am monitoring a call in which Flight 11,
translation.zh: ‎我监听到11号航班的一通电话

translation.en: the flight attendant is advising our reps that the pilot, everyone's been stabbed.
translation.zh:
‎乘务员通知我们的工作人员
‎称飞行员等被刺伤

translation.en: -[operator] Flight 11? -[woman] Yeah.
[operator] Uh, we contacted Air Traffic Control.
translation.zh: ‎我们联系了空中交通管制部门

translation.en: They are going to handle this as a confirmed hijacking,
translation.zh: ‎他们会以确认的劫机事件来处理

translation.en: so they're moving all traffic out of this aircraft's way.
translation.zh: ‎目前正在将所有其他航班安排开

translation.en: [woman] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [operator] He turned his transponder off,
translation.zh: ‎机上应答机已被关闭

translation.en: so we don't have a definitive altitude for him.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们无法确定具体飞行高度

translation.en: Uh, we're just going by-- They seem to think that--
translation.zh: ‎我们只是查…他们似乎想要…

translation.en: They have him on a primary radar. They seem to think that he is descending.
translation.zh:
‎他们启用了初级雷达
‎飞机似乎正在下降

translation.en: [woman] I entered the lobby,
translation.zh: ‎我走进大厅

translation.en: and to get to my 82nd floor, I had to take two elevators.
translation.zh: ‎要去82楼 我需要转一趟电梯

translation.en: So, first was the express elevator to 78th floor, and then to 82nd.
translation.zh:
‎所以 我先坐快速电梯去了78楼
‎然后再转到82楼

translation.en: And I came to my office
translation.zh: ‎我来到办公室

translation.en: and I was so lucky, because I had my desk just by the window
translation.zh: ‎我很幸运 因为我的桌子就在窗边

translation.en: on the east side of the tower.
translation.zh: ‎位于北塔的东侧

translation.en: So I saw from my window the East River, all bridges,
translation.zh:
‎因此 我可以从窗外看到东河
‎所有的桥

translation.en: and far, far away, towards Europe.
translation.zh: ‎远处是欧洲方向

translation.en: The Division Chief was my title in the Law Department
translation.zh: ‎当时我是法律部门的处长

translation.en: of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.
translation.zh: ‎供职于纽约与新泽西港口事务管理局

translation.en: And the Trade Center was built in the mid-late '60s, early '70s
translation.zh:
‎世界贸易中心建立于60年代中后期
‎70年代初期

translation.en: by the Port Authority, and so when it was finished,
translation.zh: ‎由港务局承建 因此这里建成后

translation.en: they put their headquarters there.
translation.zh: ‎由港务局承建 因此这里建成后 ‎港务局总部就设在了这里

translation.en: It was a Japanese man who was the main architect.
translation.zh: ‎主设计师是一名日裔

translation.en: Ironically, he was afraid of heights.
translation.zh: ‎讽刺的是他恐高

translation.en: And yet he built these two behemoth buildings.
translation.zh: ‎但他还是设计了这两栋高大的建筑

translation.en: The power brokers in New York wanted to build this center
translation.zh:
‎纽约的政治掮客们
‎想要将这里打造成

translation.en: for commerce and world trade, including the Rockefellers.
translation.zh:
‎商务和世界贸易中心
‎包括洛克菲勒家族

translation.en: So they came up with the "World Trade Center."
translation.zh:
‎因此他们将这里称为
‎“世界贸易中心”

translation.en: When they were first built, architecture critics didn't like them.
translation.zh:
‎刚落成的时候
‎建筑评论家不喜欢这里

translation.en: Common joke was,
translation.zh: ‎常常会听到一则笑话：

translation.en: "Welcome to New York, home of famous buildings,
translation.zh:
‎“欢迎来到纽约
‎这里有知名的建筑

translation.en: beautiful buildings, like the Empire State Building
translation.zh:
‎美丽的建筑
‎比如帝国大厦

translation.en: and the Chrysler Building, and the boxes they came in."
translation.zh:
‎克莱斯勒大厦
‎还有杵在这里的盒子楼”

translation.en: But they grew on people, so to speak,
translation.zh:
‎但是 人们慢慢喜欢上了这里
‎所以 也可以说

translation.en: and they were much beloved.
translation.zh: ‎这里还是很受人喜欢的

translation.en: On a given Monday through Friday,
translation.zh: ‎周一到周五期间

translation.en: you might have 70, 80 thousand people just in that little 16-acre spot.
translation.zh:
‎这里小小的16英亩之地
‎大约有七八万人

translation.en: So it was kind of like a city within a city.
translation.zh: ‎有点像是城中城

translation.en: [man] I was the assistant commissioner
translation.zh: ‎我当时是纽约市调查局的

translation.en: at the New York City Department of Investigation.
translation.zh: ‎助理局长

translation.en: We were doing an operation on the day of the attack.
translation.zh: ‎我们在袭击当天有个行动

translation.en: We were at the World Trade Center meeting up with,
translation.zh: ‎当天我们要在世界贸易中心见个人

translation.en: basically a bad guy to take a bribe who didn't want to pay his taxes.
translation.zh:
‎当时大概是有个坏家伙收受贿赂
‎不愿缴税

translation.en: We had a team of investigators who were wired up,
translation.zh: ‎我们有一组调查员很兴奋

translation.en: and they were gonna meet him there.
translation.zh: ‎他们准备在那里和他见面

translation.en: [Boston FAA] Is that American 11 trying to call?
translation.zh: ‎美航11号试着联系过你们吗？

translation.en: [man] Put that phone up on that HAM--
translation.zh: ‎把电话切到业余无线电…

translation.en: [Atta] We have some planes. Just stay quiet and we'll be okay.
translation.zh:
‎有几架飞机
‎请保持安静 会没事的

translation.en: We're returning to the airport.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在返回机场

translation.en: [Boston FAA] American 11, are you trying to call?
translation.zh:
‎（声源：
‎11号航班劫机者） ‎美航11号 你在试着联系我们吗？

translation.en: [Atta] Nobody move. Everything will be okay.
translation.zh: ‎大家都别动 一切都没事

translation.en: If you try to make any moves, you will endanger yourself and the airplane.
translation.zh:
‎要有人想动一下
‎你们和飞机都会受伤

translation.en: Just stay quiet.
translation.zh: ‎保持安静

translation.en: [man] Hi, Boston Center, T.M.U. We have a problem here.
translation.zh: ‎这里是波士顿交管中心 ‎我们这里遇到了麻烦

translation.en: We have a hijacked aircraft headed towards New York,
translation.zh: ‎一架被劫持的飞机正飞往纽约

translation.en: and we need you guys to--
translation.zh: ‎我们需要你们…

translation.en: We need someone to scramble some F-16s or something up there to help us out.
translation.zh:
‎需要有人紧急启用F-16战机之类
‎帮助我们解决这个问题

translation.en: [Powell] Is this real-world or exercise?
translation.zh: ‎是认真的 还是演练？

translation.en: [Boston ATC] No. This is not an exercise, not a test.
translation.zh: ‎不 不是演练 不是测试

translation.en: [Powell] Okay. Hey, uh, hold on one second. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎好 稍等一下 好吗？

translation.en: [Boston ATC] Yes.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Powell] Hey, hey, hey, hey.
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: -Hey, seriously. Big time. -[man] What?
translation.zh:
‎-说真的 出事了
‎-什么？

translation.en: [woman] What?
translation.zh: ‎什么？

translation.en: -[people exclaim] -What was that?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？

translation.en: [woman 2] Is that real-world? Real-world hijacking.
translation.zh: ‎是真的吗？真的发生劫机了

translation.en: [Glogowski] Quarter to nine in my office, there was absolute silence.
translation.zh:
‎8点45分的时候
‎我的办公室非常安静

translation.en: Everybody was working on their machines.
translation.zh: ‎大家都在机器上工作着

translation.en: And all of a sudden,
translation.zh: ‎突然间

translation.en: the silence was broken by tremendous blast.
translation.zh: ‎巨大的爆炸声打破了这种寂静

translation.en: [man] And can I get your autograph also?
translation.zh: ‎能请你再签下名吗？

translation.en: [man 1] What the hell was that?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么？

translation.en: [man 2] Sounded like a plane crash.
translation.zh: ‎听起来像是撞机了

translation.en: -Yo! Close to ya. -[man 1] Come to us! Come to us! Come to us!
translation.zh:
‎-哟！是对面
‎-请跟我们说话！

translation.en: Come to us!
translation.zh: ‎请跟我们说话！

translation.en: Hey, Beth! What is that?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 贝丝！怎么了？

translation.en: Something-- Somebody hit the World Trade Center? Or the--
translation.zh:
‎有东西…有人袭击了
‎世界贸易中心？还是…

translation.en: [man 1] It's the Trade Center. Trade Center.
translation.zh: ‎是世贸中心

translation.en: [man 3] Holy shit!
translation.zh: ‎天啊！

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: ‎该死！

translation.en: [reporter 1] This just in, you are looking at,
translation.zh: ‎您现在收看的是

translation.en: obviously, a very disturbing live shot there.
translation.zh: ‎非常令人不安的现场报道

translation.en: That is the World Trade Center,
translation.zh: ‎那里是世界贸易中心

translation.en: and we have unconfirmed reports this morning
translation.zh: ‎据今早未经确认的报道称

translation.en: that a plane has crashed into one of the towers.
translation.zh: ‎一架飞机撞上了其中一座塔

translation.en: [reporter 2] We're looking--
translation.zh: ‎对 我们在看…

translation.en: There's no doubt there was a huge explosion and fire.
translation.zh:
‎毫无疑问
‎那里发生了巨大的爆炸和火灾

translation.en: Lots of black smoke coming from that building.
translation.zh: ‎大楼里冒出浓重的黑烟

translation.en: Black smoke, again,
translation.zh: ‎这些黑烟

translation.en: would indicate that the fire is nowhere near under control.
translation.zh: ‎说明火势并未得到控制

translation.en: [Kern] I was up in my office, at that point, on the 62nd floor.
translation.zh: ‎我当时在办公室里 位于62楼

translation.en: At 8:46, there was suddenly a loud bang and a crash,
translation.zh:
‎8点46分时
‎突然有一声很响的撞击声

translation.en: and the building started shaking, which I had never felt before.
translation.zh:
‎大厦开始摇晃
‎我从来没有过这样的感觉

translation.en: Now, the engineers tell me the buildings were designed
translation.zh: ‎工程师告诉过我 大厦的设计

translation.en: to sway in the wind in hurricane-force winds.
translation.zh: ‎会在飓风中随风摆动

translation.en: They had to. They couldn't be rigid, because they were too tall.
translation.zh:
‎必须如此
‎因为楼太高了 无法做到那么稳

translation.en: But this was different, this was like shaking so much so
translation.zh: ‎但这次不同 晃得太厉害了

translation.en: that a couple of my co-workers lost their footing
translation.zh: ‎有一些同事没站稳

translation.en: and, like, fell to their knees.
translation.zh: ‎摔倒在地上

translation.en: And the shaking seemed to go on for, like, 20 or 30 seconds.
translation.zh: ‎那个晃动大约持续了20到30秒

translation.en: When the shaking stopped,
translation.zh: ‎摇晃停下来后

translation.en: I yelled to everybody to get out and head for the stairs.
translation.zh: ‎我大声叫大家离开 往楼梯走

translation.en: Don't waste time waiting to find out what happened.
translation.zh: ‎不要浪费时间去看发生了什么

translation.en: Get out first, find out later.
translation.zh: ‎先离开这里 回头再看是怎么回事

translation.en: [reporter] Thousands, tens of thousands of people actually work inside those two buildings
translation.zh: ‎这两栋位于纽约金融区的建筑中

translation.en: in the heart of New York's Financial District.
translation.zh: ‎有成千上万的人在工作

translation.en: [Bouchat] I sat on the south side of the South Tower,
translation.zh: ‎我的座位在南塔的南边

translation.en: I was as far away as you could be, and I heard boom.
translation.zh: ‎隔得非常远 我听到了爆炸声

translation.en: It was a very faint boom.
translation.zh: ‎是非常弱的爆炸声

translation.en: My co-workers who sat on the west and the north side of the building
translation.zh: ‎那些坐在大楼西侧和北侧的同事

translation.en: actually felt the heat of the airplane parts
translation.zh: ‎感受到了飞机零件的热度

translation.en: as they went past their windows,
translation.zh: ‎飞机经过窗户的时候

translation.en: and they said paper on their desk became charred.
translation.zh: ‎据说把桌上的纸都烧焦了

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you have any desire, at that point, to evacuate?
translation.zh: ‎当时你有没有想撤离的打算？

translation.en: No. Thought hadn't entered my head.
translation.zh: ‎没有 当时我还没来得及思考

translation.en: In fact, my mother asked me, "Are you leaving?"
translation.zh:
‎事实上 是我妈妈问我：
‎“你要离开吗？”

translation.en: Because Mom is asking, I said, "Sure."
translation.zh:
‎因为我妈妈问了我
‎我说：“当然了”

translation.en: [Green] We all thought that basically it was some knucklehead
translation.zh: ‎我们都以为大概是什么笨蛋

translation.en: who's driving some Cessna or some little thing
translation.zh: ‎开着赛斯纳或者什么小型机

translation.en: who just went out of the way and hit the building.
translation.zh: ‎飞偏了 撞上了大厦

translation.en: We didn't realize at first that it was a 757.
translation.zh:
‎刚开始我们没有意识到
‎这是一架波音757

translation.en: [Bouchat] I was packing my bag, and I noticed Jim Berger walk past,
translation.zh:
‎（吉姆·伯杰
‎怡安集团高级副总裁 德西蕾同事） ‎我在收拾东西
‎发现吉姆·伯杰走了过来

translation.en: and he had earlier heard me say that a bomb had gone off,
translation.zh: ‎他之前听我说是炸弹爆炸了

translation.en: and he came by to tell us that he had heard
translation.zh: ‎他过来是告诉我们

translation.en: that it was actually a plane that had gone into the North Tower.
translation.zh: ‎他听说其实是一架飞机撞进了北塔

translation.en: Tower One.
translation.zh: ‎一号塔

translation.en: It went into the core of the building, straight in.
translation.zh: ‎飞机直接撞进了大厦中间

translation.en: So if you were at the 92nd floor or above, there was no escape,
translation.zh:
‎所以 如果你在92楼或更高楼层
‎就无路可逃

translation.en: there were no stairs to come down.
translation.zh: ‎没有可以下楼的楼梯

translation.en: [firefighter] Fire Department 408. Where's the fire?
translation.zh: ‎消防局408号 哪里起火了？

translation.en: [man] Yeah. Hi. I'm on the 106th floor of the World Trade Center.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我在世贸中心的106楼

translation.en: We just had an explosion up here.
translation.zh: ‎这里发生了爆炸

translation.en: [firefighter] Okay. 106th floor?
-What building? One or Two? -[man] That's One World Trade.
translation.zh:
‎-哪栋？ 一号还是二号？
‎-世贸中心一号楼

translation.en: [firefighter] Keep the windows open if you can and just sit tight.
translation.zh:
‎好的 如果可以的话
‎请打开窗户并呆在原地

translation.en: It's gonna be a while because there's a fire downstairs.
translation.zh:
‎会需要等一下
‎因为楼下正在起火

translation.en: [man] We can't open the windows unless we break them.
translation.zh: ‎我们打不开窗户 除非砸开

translation.en: [firefighter] Okay. Just sit tight.
translation.zh: ‎好的 请呆在原地

translation.en: All right. Just sit tight. We're on the way.
translation.zh: ‎好的 呆在原地 我们来了

translation.en: [man] All right. Please hurry.
translation.zh: ‎好的 请快一点

translation.en: [Bouchat] And what had started as a beautiful, beautiful day was now turning brown.
translation.zh: ‎原本美好的一天现在变得黯淡了

translation.en: There was paper swirling outside our window.
translation.zh: ‎窗外纸张纷飞

translation.en: And at that point it's when Jim said, "Time to go home."
translation.zh: ‎吉姆当时说：“该回家了”

translation.en: And we thought, "This is great. It's not even 9:00 a.m.
translation.zh:
‎我们想着：
‎“太好了 当时还不到上午9点

translation.en: and we were headed home."
translation.zh: ‎我们要回家了”

translation.en: As I headed to the elevators, Jim went down the corridor.
translation.zh:
‎我往电梯走的时候
‎吉姆在走廊上

translation.en: He was doing another sweep of the floor.
translation.zh: ‎他又检查了一遍楼层

translation.en: He went to make sure everybody knew that it was time to go
translation.zh: ‎确保每个人都知道可以离开了

translation.en: and there was nobody left.
translation.zh: ‎当时没有人留下了

translation.en: Jim did not make it out.
translation.zh: ‎吉姆没能逃出去

translation.en: [reporter] At this point, we do not have official injury updates to bring you.
translation.zh: ‎目前我们还没有正式的伤情报告

translation.en: We are only now beginning to put together the pieces of this horrible incident.
translation.zh:
‎我们目前只能
‎将这一可怕事件的细节整理起来

translation.en: [Frederick] The building shook.
translation.zh: ‎大楼晃动了

translation.en: So we didn't know what that was.
translation.zh: ‎我们不知道发生了什么

translation.en: Automatically, the alarms went off.
translation.zh: ‎警报自动响起来了

translation.en: And when the alarms go off, all the elevators, everything is disabled.
translation.zh:
‎警报响起来的时候
‎电梯什么的全都用不了了

translation.en: We knew it was bad. We knew something was wrong.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道情况很糟
‎我们知道有麻烦了

translation.en: So as I stood in the lobby, I noticed a lady coming toward me.
translation.zh:
‎我站在大厅
‎发现有位女士正朝我走来

translation.en: She came from the Twin Towers.
translation.zh: ‎她是从双子塔过来

translation.en: And she was very, very badly burned, and I said, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: ‎她被严重烧伤了 我说：“天啊”

translation.en: Somebody yelled, screamed to get a towel to cover her up
translation.zh: ‎有人大喊着要拿一块毛巾给她盖上

translation.en: because her skin was, like, really peeling bad.
translation.zh: ‎因为她的皮肤脱落得很严重

translation.en: And I found out later that she was burned from the fuel.
translation.zh: ‎后来我才发现她是被燃料烧伤了

translation.en: [interviewer] Must've come down the elevator shaft. Elevators. Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-应该是从电梯通风井流下来的
‎-是的 电梯 没错

translation.en: For some reason, the ladies popped into my head, and I said to myself,
translation.zh:
‎不知为何我忽然想到那两位女士
‎我告诉自己：

translation.en: "You know, maybe I should go and see if they're up there,
translation.zh: ‎“也许我该去看看她们还在不在那里

translation.en: 'cause I'm not sure."
translation.zh: ‎因为我不确定”

translation.en: Being that the elevator's disabled,
translation.zh: ‎电梯当时不能用了

translation.en: I went to the freight elevator, got on, used the key, went upstairs.
translation.zh:
‎所以我去了货梯那里
‎用钥匙上了楼

translation.en: As I open the door, they were there. Three ladies waiting.
translation.zh:
‎开门的时候 她们就在那里
‎有三位女士在等待着

translation.en: They were stuck up there.
translation.zh: ‎她们被困在那里

translation.en: One of the ladies, she bolted and ran back in her room and locked the door.
translation.zh: ‎其中一位女士跑回房间 锁上了门

translation.en: -[interviewer] She was scared. -Scared. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道为什么 害怕 对
‎-她很害怕

translation.en: So I ran after her and I banged on the door and I told her,
translation.zh:
‎所以 我追上去砸了门
‎并告诉她：

translation.en: "Excuse me, miss. I don't know what's going on."
translation.zh:
‎“对不起 女士
‎我不知道发生了什么”

translation.en: "I know it's something bad. I don't know. I'm scared myself."
translation.zh:
‎“我知道是件坏事
‎我自己也吓坏了”

translation.en: "We got to leave."
translation.zh: ‎“我们得离开”

translation.en: She started crying. She told me, "Okay. I'll come with you."
translation.zh: ‎她开始哭着说：“好 我跟你一起”

translation.en: [interviewer] You eventually-- You got them to safety.
translation.zh: ‎你最终…保证了她们的安全

translation.en: From there, did you know what happened to them?
translation.zh: ‎那时候的你知道发生什么了吗？

translation.en: No. I did not.
translation.zh: ‎不 我不知道

translation.en: [reporter 1] Planes, typically, are not that close to these buildings.
translation.zh:
‎通常情况下
‎飞机不会和这些建筑物离得这么近

translation.en: Wind speeds at this point, not tremendous at all.
translation.zh: ‎当时的风速完全不大

translation.en: -Flying conditions, near perfect. -[reporter 2] Picture-perfect.
translation.zh:
‎-飞行条件几乎完美
‎-视野很好

translation.en: [Kern] There were already people pouring in
translation.zh: ‎楼下的每层楼

translation.en: from every floor above us into the stairwells.
translation.zh: ‎都有人涌进楼梯间

translation.en: I decided I was going to stand at the entrance
translation.zh: ‎我决定站在入口处

translation.en: and count the people from my division
translation.zh: ‎清点我们部门的人数

translation.en: and make sure all nine got into the stairwell.
translation.zh: ‎保证九个人都走进了楼梯间

translation.en: I was the Division Chief, so I felt they were my responsibility.
translation.zh:
‎我是处长
‎所以 我觉得这是我的责任

translation.en: And the stairs were very crowded, so they weren't moving fast at all.
translation.zh: ‎楼梯间非常拥挤 根本走不快

translation.en: At the 20th floor…
translation.zh: ‎走到20楼时

translation.en: is where we first saw a firefighter going up as we were going down.
translation.zh:
‎我们第一次看到有个救火员上楼
‎而我们在下楼

translation.en: That meant the rest of the trip we had to go single file,
translation.zh:
‎这意味着剩下的路
‎我们只能单行通过

translation.en: because now Port Authority police and firefighters
translation.zh: ‎因为港务局的警察和救火员

translation.en: were coming up the other side to try and get the building evacuated.
translation.zh:
‎当时正在从另一边往上爬
‎他们要去疏散大楼

translation.en: I was glad to see the firefighters.
translation.zh: ‎见到救火员我很高兴

translation.en: [man] This is Central. Be advised, from our location I see heavy smoke
translation.zh:
‎（声源：
‎纽约消防局 未知人士） ‎这里是…请注意
‎我们这里能看到很浓的烟雾

translation.en: coming from the building of the World Trade Center.
translation.zh: ‎从世界贸易中心大厦处飘来

translation.en: Send me just about anything that you got in this direction, Kate.
translation.zh: ‎有什么相关消息都请告诉我 凯特

translation.en: [man] The morning of September 11th, I wasn't actually supposed to be on duty.
translation.zh: ‎9月11日早上 本来不是我当值

translation.en: I had worked a 24-hour shift Sunday night,
translation.zh:
‎我的工作是24小时一班
‎从周日晚上到周一白天

translation.en: Monday day, September 11th being Tuesday.
translation.zh: ‎9月11日是周二

translation.en: The captain of Engine 24,
translation.zh: ‎24号消防车的中队长

translation.en: he had asked me to pick up the shift for him.
translation.zh: ‎让我替他代班

translation.en: The lobby glass was broken.
translation.zh: ‎大厅玻璃碎了

translation.en: We walked in and we could see cracks in the marble,
translation.zh:
‎我们走进去
‎可以看到大理石上有裂痕

translation.en: and I could see some dead bodies near the elevators.
translation.zh: ‎电梯附近有一些尸体

translation.en: This was the jet fuel that had come down the elevator shafts.
translation.zh:
‎顺着电梯井
‎还有流下来的飞机燃油

translation.en: The order was, basically, we were gonna have to walk up and fight this fire
translation.zh: ‎我们收到指示要上楼灭火

translation.en: and get as many people as we can.
translation.zh: ‎尽可能多地救人

translation.en: And we started going up single file.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们开始排成单行往上爬

translation.en: And we had lots of civilians coming down single file, very orderly.
translation.zh:
‎有很多市民排着单行下来
‎非常有秩序

translation.en: Eventually we got a guy from the 90th floor that had seen fire.
translation.zh:
‎我们遇到了一个从90楼下来的人
‎他那里看到了火

translation.en: So, that's when I knew we had a very long climb to go.
translation.zh: ‎那时候我才知道还要爬很久

translation.en: [Bouchat] I made it very quickly down to the 78th floor Sky Lobby.
translation.zh: ‎很快我到了78楼的空中大厅

translation.en: It was packed with people.
translation.zh: ‎里面挤满了人

translation.en: About 400 were waiting on that lobby
translation.zh: ‎大厅里大概有400人在等待

translation.en: to catch the express elevator to the bottom.
translation.zh: ‎准备坐快速电梯下到底层

translation.en: I believe I got into one of the last elevators that made it to the lobby level.
translation.zh: ‎我进了最后一批升到大厅层的电梯

translation.en: [reporter] It's obviously-- Something devastating has happened.
translation.zh:
‎很明显…
‎是发生了毁灭性的事件

translation.en: And again, unconfirmed report
translation.zh: ‎据未经证实的报告称

translation.en: that a plane has crashed into one of the towers there.
translation.zh: ‎一架飞机撞进了其中一座高楼

translation.en: We are efforting…
translation.zh: ‎我们正在努力…

translation.en: -[man 1] Can you look out your window? -[man 2] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你现在能看看窗外吗？
‎-好

translation.en: [man 1] Can you see a guy at 4,000 feet,
translation.zh: ‎能看到4000英尺有一架飞机

translation.en: about five east of the airport? Looks like he's…
translation.zh:
‎大约飞在机场东边五公里处吗？
‎看起来它…

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah. I see him.
translation.zh: ‎对 我看到它了

translation.en: [man 1] Is he descending to the building also?
translation.zh: ‎听着 它也在向下冲进大楼吗？

translation.en: -[man 2] He's descending really quick too. -[man 1] Well, that's…
translation.zh:
‎-它的下降速度也非常快 对
‎-好 那…

translation.en: [man 2] 4,500 feet, now. He just dropped 800 feet in, like, one sweep.
translation.zh:
‎现在是4500英尺
‎他一个动作就下降了800英尺

translation.en: [man 1] That's another situation.
translation.zh: ‎又有情况了

translation.en: [Bouchat] We came up to street level, and I was with three of my co-workers.
translation.zh:
‎我们来到大街上
‎当时我和三个同事在一起

translation.en: We found each other on the elevator.
translation.zh: ‎我们在电梯上遇到了彼此

translation.en: And as we stepped off onto Liberty Street…
translation.zh: ‎正在我们往自由街走的时候

translation.en: we took about ten steps and Ingrid yelled, "Run."
translation.zh:
‎大概走了十步
‎英格丽德大叫：“跑”

translation.en: She doesn't remember why she said it, but we ran down Liberty Street
translation.zh:
‎她甚至不记得自己说了什么 ‎但是我们沿着自由街
‎往祖科蒂公园的教堂街跑去

translation.en: towards Church Street in Zuccotti Park.
translation.zh:
‎但是我们沿着自由街
‎往祖科蒂公园的教堂街跑去

translation.en: And the time was 9:03.
translation.zh: ‎当时是九点零三分

translation.en: I know that now, because at 9:03 is when United 175 crashed into the South Tower.
translation.zh:
‎我现在知道了 ‎9点3分的时候
‎美联航175号航班冲进了南塔

translation.en: [Dries] Oh my God!
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊！ ‎（卡罗琳·德莱斯 纽约大学学生）

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: ‎我的天！

translation.en: [reporter 1] Oh my goodness. There's another one.
translation.zh:
‎-我的老天爷 又来一架
‎-天啊

translation.en: Oh my goodness. There's another one.
translation.zh: ‎我的老天爷 又来一架

translation.en: [reporter 2] This seems to be on purpose.
translation.zh: ‎这似乎是故意的

translation.en: -[man 1] Another one hit the building. -[man 2] Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-又有一架飞机撞上了大楼
‎-哇噢

translation.en: -[man 1] Another one just hit it hard. -[man 2] Another one hit the World Trade.
translation.zh:
‎-又有一架狠狠撞了上去
‎-又有一架飞机撞上了世贸中心

translation.en: -[man 1] The whole building came apart. -[man 2] Holy smokes.
translation.zh:
‎-整栋楼都散架了
‎-我的天啊

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: ‎快点！

translation.en: Are you with me, John?
translation.zh: ‎你和我一起吗 约翰？

translation.en: [man] I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: [woman] Get down, everybody! Get down!
translation.zh: ‎趴下！

translation.en: -[man 1] What happened? -[man 2] What's happening?
translation.zh:
‎-发生什么了？
‎-怎么回事？

translation.en: [woman] Waiting for another explosion!
translation.zh: ‎又爆炸了一次！

translation.en: [man 1] Get back!
translation.zh: ‎退后！

translation.en: [man 2] Let's just get back.
translation.zh: ‎我们到后面去

translation.en: [officer 1] Come on! Let's move! -Let's move! Let's go! Move it! -[officer 2] Come on! Move it! Come on!
translation.zh:
‎走吧！快点！我们走！
‎我们走！走吧！快点！

translation.en: [firefighter 1] Second plane just--
translation.zh: ‎第二架飞机刚才…

translation.en: [firefighter 2] DC01, go.
translation.zh: ‎DC01 过去

translation.en: [firefighter 1] Second explosion in Number Two World Trade Center on the upper floors.
translation.zh:
‎世界贸易中心二号楼高层
‎发生了第二次爆炸

translation.en: It's Number Two World Trade Center, explosion on the upper floors.
translation.zh:
‎世界贸易中心二号楼高层
‎发生了第二次爆炸

translation.en: [reporter] Now it's obvious, I think,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得现在很明显

translation.en: that there's a second plane just crashed into the World Trade Center.
translation.zh: ‎又有一架飞机撞进了世界贸易中心

translation.en: I think we have a terrorist act
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这是恐怖行为

translation.en: of proportions that we cannot begin to imagine at this juncture.
translation.zh: ‎目前还无法想象其规模

translation.en: [Kern] You could hear people gasping.
translation.zh: ‎你能听到人们在喘着粗气

translation.en: It just felt like the world was falling apart.
translation.zh: ‎仿佛世界都在土崩瓦解

translation.en: [Bouchat] Your brain is just trying to make some sense of something
translation.zh: ‎你的脑海在试着理解

translation.en: that was-- made no sense.
translation.zh: ‎一些没有意义的东西

translation.en: It was so unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎太不可思议了

translation.en: [Kern] And that was just the beginning.
translation.zh: ‎这还只是个开始

translation.en: [air traffic controller] Third aircraft hijack, heading towards Washington.
translation.zh: ‎第三架被劫持飞机正在飞往华盛顿

translation.en: Scramble Langley, head them towards the Washington area.
translation.zh:
‎兰利紧急起飞令
‎命令他们驶向华盛顿地区

translation.en: [man] The September 11, 2001 attacks
translation.zh: ‎2001年9月11日的袭击案

translation.en: were the most consequential terrorist attacks
translation.zh: ‎是人类历史上

translation.en: in the history of mankind.
translation.zh: ‎后果最严重的恐怖袭击案件

translation.en: It's hard, I think, to reimagine the sense of profound upheaval…
translation.zh: ‎我觉得很难在袭击发生数小时后

translation.en: dislocation, chaos, uncertainty that existed on September 11th
translation.zh: ‎去重新想象911事件之中的

translation.en: in the hours after the attacks.
translation.zh: ‎深刻巨变、错位、混乱和不确定性

translation.en: I mean, no one knew who had attacked us, why they had attacked us,
translation.zh:
‎无人知道是谁袭击了我们
‎为什么要袭击我们

translation.en: or what attacks were coming next.
translation.zh: ‎或者之后还会有怎样的袭击

translation.en: And this led to perhaps the main question of that era,
translation.zh: ‎这也引发了当时的一个主要疑问

translation.en: which was, "Why do they hate us?"
translation.zh: ‎即“他们为什么恨我们？”

translation.en: The attacks on the Twin Towers were just an opening salvo
translation.zh: ‎对双子塔的袭击事件只是一场序幕

translation.en: in a sustained day of attacks against targets
translation.zh:
‎它的目标是
‎向象征美国力量的目标

translation.en: representing the symbols of American power.
translation.zh: ‎发起持续袭击

translation.en: It was an operation carried out
translation.zh: ‎这一项行动

translation.en: by acolytes or followers of Osama bin Laden.
translation.zh: ‎由奥萨马·本·拉登的追随者发起

translation.en: Terrorism, I think, can best be defined as violence or the threat of violence
translation.zh:
‎我认为对恐怖主义的最好定义是
‎暴力或暴力威胁

translation.en: designed to achieve fundamental political change.
translation.zh: ‎其目的是为了实现基本政治变革

translation.en: All terrorists see themselves as reluctant warriors
translation.zh:
‎所有的恐怖分子
‎都觉得自己是不情不愿的战士

translation.en: cast on the defensive against predatory aggressors.
translation.zh: ‎目的是防御掠夺成性的侵略者

translation.en: So they feel they have no choice but to use violence.
translation.zh:
‎因此 他们觉得自己别无选择
‎只能诉诸暴力

translation.en: That was precisely bin Laden's conceit,
translation.zh: ‎这正符合本·拉登的幻想

translation.en: that terrorism could change the course of history.
translation.zh: ‎恐怖主义会改变历史的进程

translation.en: But the path to 9/11 began decades before,
translation.zh:
‎但911事件的发生
‎早在几十年前就有了苗头

translation.en: really, at the heart of the Cold War
translation.zh: ‎那时正处于冷战期间

translation.en: with the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
translation.zh: ‎1979年苏联入侵阿富汗

translation.en: That's really where it all started.
translation.zh: ‎那是一切开始的起点

translation.en: I don't think anyone fully understood
translation.zh: ‎我觉得没有人能够理解

translation.en: that this was a remarkable turning point in history.
translation.zh: ‎这一事件会成为历史的重要转折点

translation.en: And no one could have ever foreseen
translation.zh: ‎没有人能够预见到

translation.en: that this would become such a pivotal event
translation.zh: ‎这一事件会酝酿出如此重大的后果

translation.en: that would have such an effect, not only on the rest of the 20th century,
translation.zh: ‎不仅影响了之后的20世纪

translation.en: but would determine the course of at least the opening decades
translation.zh: ‎还至今决定了21世纪

translation.en: of the 21st century as well.
translation.zh: ‎头几十年的进程

translation.en: [reporter 1] Soviet troops fought pitched battles in the streets of Kabul,
translation.zh: ‎在如今阿富汗的首都喀布尔的街头

translation.en: the capital of Afghanistan, today.
translation.zh: ‎苏联军队遭遇了激烈的战斗

translation.en: [reporter 2] The Soviet Union has sent tanks and helicopter gunships
translation.zh: ‎苏联派出了坦克和武装直升机

translation.en: to help crush the Muslim rebels.
translation.zh: ‎用来协助摧毁穆斯林叛军

translation.en: I am a former CIA officer involved in the Afghan resistance
translation.zh: ‎我是前中情局工作人员 ‎参与过阿富汗抵抗苏联入侵的行动

translation.en: against the Soviet occupation.
translation.zh: ‎参与过阿富汗抵抗苏联入侵的行动

translation.en: The American people, at that time,
translation.zh: ‎当时的美国人

translation.en: would have been scrambling to get their world atlas
translation.zh:
‎需要翻出世界地图册
‎才能艰难地理解

translation.en: to find out where the hell Afghanistan was.
translation.zh: ‎阿富汗到底在哪里

translation.en: And why do we care?
translation.zh: ‎以及我们为什么要在乎那里？

translation.en: Well, we cared, at least in Washington,
translation.zh: ‎我们是在乎的 至少华盛顿是这样

translation.en: because the Soviet Union,
translation.zh: ‎因为那里涉及了苏联

translation.en: the other side of the equation of a Cold War
translation.zh: ‎它是冷战的另一方

translation.en: that had been running for decades at that time, since 1948,
translation.zh:
‎自1948年以来
‎冷战已经持续了数十年

translation.en: for, you know, at a cost of, you know, $10 trillion or more,
translation.zh: ‎花费了十万亿美元甚至更高的代价

translation.en: had moved outside its borders in a very flagrant way.
translation.zh:
‎苏联通过一种非常明目张胆的方式
‎向外扩张了自己的边境

translation.en: And so the choice was, for any American president,
translation.zh: ‎因此对于任何一位美国总统

translation.en: any American administration,
translation.zh: ‎任何一届美国政府来说

translation.en: you have to do something, you have to respond.
translation.zh: ‎都必须有所作为 做出回应

translation.en: The Soviet leaders have openly and publicly declared
translation.zh: ‎苏联领导人公开宣称

translation.en: that the only morality they recognize is that which will further their cause,
translation.zh:
‎他们所承认的唯一道德
‎就是推动他们的事业

translation.en: which is world revolution.
translation.zh: ‎就是世界革命

translation.en: [Bearden] Ronald Reagan comes in
translation.zh: ‎罗纳德·里根当选

translation.en: and he brings in a new director of Central Intelligence,
translation.zh: ‎并任命了中央情报局的新局长

translation.en: and that's Bill Casey.
translation.zh: ‎即比尔·卡西

translation.en: Bill Casey called me up to his office and said,
translation.zh: ‎比尔·卡西把我叫到办公室说：

translation.en: "I want you to go to Afghanistan. I'll give you a billion dollars a year."
translation.zh:
‎“我需要你前往阿富汗
‎我每年会给你拨10亿美元”

translation.en: "I don't want you to get these guys to win."
translation.zh: ‎“我不希望你让苏联人成功”

translation.en: "We don't want to just fight to the last Afghan."
translation.zh:
‎“我们不想让阿富汗战斗得
‎只剩下最后一个人

translation.en: "We want you to go and drive these guys out."
translation.zh: ‎我们希望你能把那些家伙赶走”

translation.en: "And if a billion isn't enough, I'll give you more."
translation.zh: ‎“如果十亿不够 我会给你更多”

translation.en: The pressure was on from that moment forward.
translation.zh: ‎从那一刻起 我有了压力

translation.en: Absolutely no backing down.
translation.zh: ‎绝对没有回头路

translation.en: By 1985, there was possibly a million Afghans had been killed,
translation.zh:
‎到了1985年
‎大概有一百万阿富汗人被杀害

translation.en: 1.5 million had been wounded or maimed,
translation.zh: ‎有一百五十万人受伤或残疾

translation.en: a million had been driven into exile into Iran,
translation.zh: ‎一百万人被驱逐流放去了伊朗

translation.en: and two million across the border into Pakistan.
translation.zh: ‎两百万人越过边境去了巴基斯坦

translation.en: Of a population of about 13 million at the time,
translation.zh: ‎当时的人口总共大约是一千三百万

translation.en: that's like a third have either been killed, wounded, or driven into exile.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说有三分之一的人口
‎或被杀害 或受到伤害 ‎或被驱逐流放

translation.en: The decision was made. We're going to go into this thing.
translation.zh:
‎已经做出了决定
‎我们需要开始参与这一事件

translation.en: So let's get on with it and make it go away.
translation.zh: ‎所以这就继续并让它消失吧

translation.en: The United States was giving literally billions of dollars in the crucial years,
translation.zh:
‎美国在关键的那几年
‎84年 85年 86年

translation.en: '84, '85, '86, to the mujahideen.
translation.zh: ‎给圣战者提供了数十亿美元

translation.en: [Rashid] The mujahideen were essentially the Afghans who rose up
translation.zh: ‎圣战者的主要来源

translation.en: on the basis of Islam
translation.zh: ‎是信仰伊斯兰的阿富汗人

translation.en: to free their country from Soviet occupation.
translation.zh:
‎他们想让自己的国家
‎摆脱苏联的占领

translation.en: Jihad was essentially the Muslim struggle against oppression, dictatorship,
translation.zh:
‎圣战的本质是
‎穆斯林反对压迫、专制、独裁

translation.en: authoritarianism, and non-Muslims who wanted to conquer Muslim territory.
translation.zh: ‎以及想要征服穆斯林领土的非穆斯林

translation.en: [Bearden] One has to imagine the challenges
translation.zh: ‎可以想象要向战争中的阿富汗人

translation.en: of delivering tens of thousands of tons of ordnance,
translation.zh: ‎输送成千上万数不胜数的物资

translation.en: and money, and other things to the Afghans in this war.
translation.zh:
‎金钱和其他物品
‎是多么大的挑战

translation.en: On the Afghan side, we had seven separate party leaders.
translation.zh:
‎阿富汗方面
‎有七个独立的党派领导人

translation.en: They were representing both ethnic and tribal groups
translation.zh: ‎他们同时代表了种族和部落群体

translation.en: and separated by being fundamentalist or moderate.
translation.zh:
‎因为原教旨或态度温和与否
‎而被分开

translation.en: The four fundamentalists included Gulbuddin Hekmatyar, The Dark Prince.
translation.zh:
‎四位原教旨主义者包括
‎大恶魔古尔布丁·希克马蒂亚尔

translation.en: Always wore a black turban, and everybody in the world, uh,
translation.zh:
‎总是戴着黑色头巾
‎除了他自己的几位指挥官

translation.en: other than some of his commanders, absolutely hated him.
translation.zh: ‎全世界人民全都恨他

translation.en: [reporter] One man in particular appears to have a reasonably strong following.
translation.zh: ‎其中有个人似乎有相当多的追随者

translation.en: His name is Gulbuddin Hekmatyar…
translation.zh: ‎他的名字是古尔布丁·希克马蒂亚尔

translation.en: a 33-year-old former engineering student from Kabul University.
translation.zh: ‎一位33岁的前喀布尔大学工科生

translation.en: [Rashid] He developed a very nasty reputation. He spent time at Kabul University.
translation.zh: ‎他臭名昭著 曾经就读于喀布尔大学

translation.en: There was a very strong rumor, I remember,
translation.zh: ‎我记得当时很流行一个传言

translation.en: that he was responsible for starting the trend
translation.zh: ‎据说是带起了一种习气

translation.en: to throw acid into girls' faces,
translation.zh: ‎往女孩脸上泼酸

translation.en: because women at that time were not covered up.
translation.zh: ‎因为当时的女人没有包裹起来

translation.en: They were in skirts and dresses and going to the university.
translation.zh: ‎她们穿着短裙和连衣裙去上大学

translation.en: Hekmatyar sentenced me to death because I was writing against him.
translation.zh:
‎因为我写了东西反对希克马蒂亚尔
‎他判了我死刑

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] A time came that we had no choice but to pick up arms.
translation.zh:
‎时机已到
‎我们别无选择 只能拿起武器

translation.en: We were facing war and had no choice but to pick up arms.
translation.zh:
‎我们面对战争 别无选择
‎只能拿起武器

translation.en: The Soviets wanted Afghanistan
translation.zh: ‎苏联想要把阿富汗

translation.en: to turn into another one of their satellite states.
translation.zh: ‎变成它的又一个卫星国家

translation.en: That was their mandate.
translation.zh: ‎那是他们的任务

translation.en: This is where I started my struggle to rescue the country.
translation.zh: ‎正是因此 我才开始拯救这个国家

translation.en: It was all for the sake of my religious duties.
translation.zh: ‎一切都是宗教担当

translation.en: My motivations were my beliefs, and defending them.
translation.zh:
‎我的动机来自于我的信念
‎我要维护它们

translation.en: Soviet troops arrived.
translation.zh: ‎苏联军队来了

translation.en: Some considered the presence of Soviet forces in Afghanistan
translation.zh: ‎有些人认为在阿富汗的苏联军队

translation.en: a danger to their own freedom and sovereignty.
translation.zh: ‎威胁到了他们的自由和主权

translation.en: The entire world felt danger. All regional countries felt danger.
translation.zh:
‎全世界都觉察到了危险
‎所有周边国家都感到了危险

translation.en: Iran, Pakistan, and Gulf countries were all feeling danger.
translation.zh:
‎伊朗、巴基斯坦和海湾国家
‎都感受到了危险

translation.en: Europe, America, and the West in general felt danger.
translation.zh: ‎欧洲、美国和西方也普遍感到危险

translation.en: They did not think that Afghans would be able to resist.
translation.zh: ‎他们不认为阿富汗人有能力反抗

translation.en: But, contrary to their expectations, the resistance began here.
translation.zh:
‎但与他们的预期相反
‎我们开始反抗了

translation.en: [Bearden] You're not interviewing these people
translation.zh: ‎跟这些人面谈

translation.en: so that one of them might marry your sister.
translation.zh: ‎目的可不是为了结成亲家

translation.en: They do what was needed.
translation.zh: ‎他们为达目的不择手段

translation.en: You had to work through that system,
translation.zh: ‎你必须想办法通过这套系统

translation.en: then the goods would flow to the commanders
translation.zh: ‎才能让物资送到

translation.en: who were doing the actual fighting including Ahmad Shah Massoud.
translation.zh:
‎那些真正在抗争的指挥者手上
‎包括艾哈迈德·沙阿·马苏德

translation.en: I gave him $250,000 a month.
translation.zh: ‎我每个月给他25万美元

translation.en: Pretty soon, these shipments were coming in to Karachi Port
translation.zh: ‎不久后 这些物资抵达卡拉奇港

translation.en: and moving through the system and into Afghanistan.
translation.zh: ‎通过他们的系统运往阿富汗

translation.en: The American effort moved from a 100-year-old design
translation.zh:
‎美国人做出的努力
‎包含了拥有百年设计历史的

translation.en: of an Enfield rifle
translation.zh: ‎恩菲尔德步枪

translation.en: up until we were having crates of AK-47s,
translation.zh: ‎以及成箱的AK-47

translation.en: 82-millimeter mortars, 107 and 122-millimeter rockets,
translation.zh:
‎82毫米口径的迫击炮
‎107和122毫米口径的火箭

translation.en: free-flight rockets that everybody loves so much,
translation.zh: ‎广受欢迎的惯性飞行火箭

translation.en: recoilless rifles.
translation.zh: ‎无后坐力炮

translation.en: [Rashid] I remember very well in '88
translation.zh: ‎我记得很清楚是在88年

translation.en: crossing the border and going into Afghanistan briefly
translation.zh: ‎我和一些外国记者一起越过边境

translation.en: for a quick trip with some foreign correspondents,
translation.zh: ‎短暂地到访阿富汗

translation.en: and seeing a huge column of fighters coming out of Afghanistan,
translation.zh:
‎在那里
‎我看见阿富汗有庞大的战斗队伍

translation.en: heading into Pakistan,
translation.zh: ‎前往巴基斯坦

translation.en: saying that they were going for R&R, rest and recuperation.
translation.zh: ‎他们要去休养和恢复

translation.en: And I remember very well being quite shocked
translation.zh:
‎我记得很清楚
‎当时我非常震惊地发现

translation.en: to find that these were mostly Arabs, and Indonesians, and Filipinos,
translation.zh:
‎这些人主要是阿拉伯人
‎还有印尼人 菲律宾人

translation.en: and people from all over.
translation.zh: ‎和来自各地的人

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] During a certain point,
translation.zh: ‎到了一定的阶段

translation.en: a group of young Arabs joined the jihad.
translation.zh: ‎一群年轻的阿拉伯人加入了圣战组织

translation.en: Their number was not big.
translation.zh: ‎他们人数不多

translation.en: They were a limited number of young men.
translation.zh: ‎是一群数量有限的年轻人

translation.en: Their countries of birth did not take the matter seriously.
translation.zh:
‎他们出生的国家
‎并没有认真对待他们

translation.en: The West did not mind that they came and took part in this war.
translation.zh:
‎西方世界不介意
‎让他们参加这场战争

translation.en: There were a very small number of them.
translation.zh: ‎这些人规模非常小

translation.en: They also had one or two outposts.
translation.zh: ‎他们还会设一两个前哨

translation.en: They called them al-Qaeda.
translation.zh: ‎他们称自己为基地组织

translation.en: [Rashid] Osama bin Laden was a member of a very modern family, the bin Ladens,
translation.zh:
‎奥萨马· 本·拉登
‎来自一个非常现代的家族

translation.en: who were very big contractors and businessmen in Saudi Arabia.
translation.zh:
‎他的家里是沙特阿拉伯
‎非常大型的承包商和商人

translation.en: But he had this desire to do something for Islam and to wage jihad.
translation.zh:
‎但是他想要为伊斯兰做些事情
‎并发动圣战

translation.en: And he arrived in Peshawar with a lot of construction equipment,
translation.zh:
‎他来到白沙瓦
‎带来了很多家中的施工设备

translation.en: which his family owned, and he helped the mujahideen build tunnels
translation.zh: ‎帮助圣战者修建隧道

translation.en: and ammunition dumps and things like that.
translation.zh: ‎以及弹药供应站之类的

translation.en: He was venerated very, very quickly and supported by all those
translation.zh: ‎他非常迅速地得到了

translation.en: who were supporting the Afghan war against the Soviets.
translation.zh:
‎那些来自支持阿富汗
‎通过武装抵抗苏联人士的支持

translation.en: [Bearden] Osama bin Laden was in Afghanistan.
translation.zh: ‎奥萨马·本·拉登当时在阿富汗

translation.en: He formed something that would be al-Qaeda,
translation.zh: ‎他成立了基地组织的前身

translation.en: which was just a collection of his guys.
translation.zh: ‎也是他手下人的集合

translation.en: It never became a big issue for CIA or anybody else.
translation.zh:
‎这个组织对中情局或其他人来说
‎并不是什么大问题

translation.en: [Hoffman] In the 1980s, we were consumed with the Cold War,
translation.zh:
‎20世纪80年代
‎我们被冷战所消耗着

translation.en: and with the threat from the Soviet Union.
translation.zh: ‎受到了来自苏联的威胁

translation.en: But behind the scenes, I think very poorly understood and underappreciated,
translation.zh:
‎但是另一方面 ‎我觉得当时的我们并没有
‎理解和正确意识到

translation.en: what was occurring was a fusion of politics and religion.
translation.zh: ‎政治和宗教融合会发生什么

translation.en: [reporter] In the mosques throughout the countryside, teachers call people to join the fighting…
translation.zh:
‎在全国的各个清真寺里
‎教师们号召人们参与战争

translation.en: telling them why jihad is obligatory for them.
translation.zh: ‎告诉他们为什么圣战是种义务

translation.en: [Hoffman] We failed to appreciate how these calls on Muslims
translation.zh:
‎我们当时没有意识到
‎这些在全球范围内

translation.en: from throughout the world to come fight in Afghanistan
translation.zh: ‎号召穆斯林来阿富汗进行战斗的行为

translation.en: and also to give financial support to the mujahideen, to the holy warriors,
translation.zh:
‎也为圣战者 圣战分子
‎带来了经济上的支持

translation.en: was really transforming the nature of terrorism.
translation.zh: ‎真正改变了恐怖主义的本质

translation.en: [Rashid] In those days, the Afghans were lobbying for the stinger missiles.
translation.zh:
‎当时阿富汗
‎正为了毒刺防空导弹进行游说

translation.en: And so were American politicians and CIA officials.
translation.zh: ‎美国政客和中情局官员们也是如此

translation.en: And, finally, President Reagan agreed
translation.zh: ‎最后 里根总统同意

translation.en: to give them a limited number of stinger missiles,
translation.zh:
‎向他们提供数量有限的
‎毒刺防空导弹

translation.en: which were the state-of-the-art missiles to shoot down Soviet planes.
translation.zh: ‎这些是可以击落苏联飞机的先进导弹

translation.en: They were trained to shoot these planes down
translation.zh: ‎经过训练 这些导弹可以击落

translation.en: as they were landing at Soviet airports.
translation.zh: ‎在苏联机场降落的飞机

translation.en: [Bearden] I brought stingers in, and in September
translation.zh:
‎是我引入了毒刺导弹 ‎九月的时候
‎我们派出了第一个小组

translation.en: we sent out our first team.
translation.zh:
‎九月的时候
‎我们派出了第一个小组

translation.en: Just a hunter-killer group outside of Jalalabad,
translation.zh:
‎那是在贾拉拉巴德外的
‎一个猎杀者组织

translation.en: waiting for a flight of Soviet MI-24 Deltas
translation.zh: ‎等待着苏联的米-24武装直升机

translation.en: to come in from Kabul flying to Jalalabad.
translation.zh: ‎这架飞机由喀布尔飞往贾拉拉巴德

translation.en: And our guys popped up and boom, boom, boom.
translation.zh: ‎我们的人出现…

translation.en: The gunner fired and went just like an arc across the sky,
translation.zh:
‎枪手开火
‎仿佛一道弧线划过天空

translation.en: trailing that white plume behind it,
translation.zh: ‎还拖着白色的气体

translation.en: and popped the first helicopter, and then boom, boom, boom.
translation.zh: ‎炸开了第一架直升飞机然后…

translation.en: So after that, the morale of the Afghan resistance
translation.zh: ‎在那之后 阿富汗抵抗运动的士气

translation.en: went from patiently waiting for martyrdom
translation.zh: ‎从耐心等待殉道者的出现

translation.en: to, you know, "Patience, my ass. Let's go out and make some trouble."
translation.zh:
‎变成了：“耐心个屁
‎我们出去搞点麻烦”

translation.en: It worked.
translation.zh: ‎这个策略成功了

translation.en: The Soviets never had a good day from when we got the stinger in
translation.zh:
‎自从我们把毒刺引入阿富汗后
‎在苏联人撤离前

translation.en: until they left.
translation.zh: ‎他们从没过过一个安生日子

translation.en: That was it. The war changed.
translation.zh: ‎事情就是这样 战争由此改变

translation.en: [reporter 1] The last Soviet soldiers left Afghanistan after nine years of war.
translation.zh:
‎经过九年的战争
‎苏联军队最终撤出阿富汗

translation.en: Nine years of occupation and death.
translation.zh: ‎九年的占领和死亡

translation.en: At least 15,000 Soviets were killed,
translation.zh: ‎至少15000名苏联人被杀死

translation.en: along with many thousands of Afghan rebels and civilians.
translation.zh:
‎同时牺牲的还有数以千计的
‎阿富汗抵抗军和平民

translation.en: [reporter 2] On the tanks, the soldiers waved and smiled and shouted.
translation.zh:
‎坦克上的士兵们挥着手
‎笑着 大喊大叫

translation.en: They were leaving and they were relieved.
translation.zh: ‎他们离开了 感到如释重负

translation.en: [Bearden] I actually had gone in that morning to be on Afghan soil
translation.zh: ‎苏联人离开的那个上午

translation.en: for when the Soviets left.
translation.zh: ‎我踏上了阿富汗的土地

translation.en: It was purely symbolic, but I was there.
translation.zh: ‎纯粹是象征性的停留 但我去了

translation.en: They left, I came back, turned out my light that night,
translation.zh:
‎他们离开后 我回到家中
‎并在那个晚上关了灯

translation.en: and that was my message to the KGB, a little over a kilometer away:
translation.zh:
‎那是我传递给克格勃的信号
‎他们就在一公里以外的地方

translation.en: "Game over, guys. You lost."
translation.zh: ‎“游戏结束 各位 你们输了”

translation.en: [Rashid] It became a kind of common assessment in the Muslim world
translation.zh: ‎穆斯林世界像是达成了某种共识

translation.en: that Muslim armies, led by the brave mujahideen,
translation.zh: ‎都认为是在勇敢的圣战者领导下

translation.en: had actually defeated the Soviets.
translation.zh: ‎穆斯林军队才真正战胜了苏联人

translation.en: [Hekmatyar, in Dari] My tears flowed.
translation.zh: ‎我的眼泪流了出来

translation.en: Even when I was praying, I was still crying.
translation.zh: ‎就连在祈祷 我也流着泪

translation.en: For two days, I kept crying.
translation.zh: ‎我不停地哭了两天

translation.en: It was like I had achieved one of my biggest dreams unexpectedly,
translation.zh: ‎仿佛是意外地实现了最大的梦想

translation.en: and before it was supposed to happen.
translation.zh: ‎没想到这么快就发生了

translation.en: I achieved my biggest dream
translation.zh: ‎我实现了自己最大的梦想

translation.en: that the last occupier soldier had left the country.
translation.zh:
‎最后一个占领者士兵
‎离开了我的国家

translation.en: I did not expect that it would happen that soon.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到一切来得这么快

translation.en: I was sure. I believed that the Soviets will be defeated in the country.
translation.zh:
‎我很确定
‎我相信苏联会被我们打败

translation.en: But not this soon.
translation.zh: ‎但没想到来得这么快

translation.en: That is how I felt.
translation.zh: ‎这就是我的感受

translation.en: [Bearden] Hekmatyar believed that sooner or later I'd have him killed.
translation.zh: ‎希克马蒂亚尔认为我迟早会杀了他

translation.en: The last meeting I had with Gulbuddin Hekmatyar…
translation.zh:
‎我和古尔布丁·希克马蒂亚尔
‎最后一次见面时

translation.en: you know, he said, "You've come here to kill me."
translation.zh: ‎他说：“你是来杀我的”

translation.en: And I said,
translation.zh: ‎我说：

translation.en: "No, engineer. I'm not going to kill you… today."
translation.zh: ‎“不 工程师 我今天不会杀你”

translation.en: [Hoffman] Remember what it was like in the United States in the early 1990s.
translation.zh: ‎我还记得90年代早期美国的样子

translation.en: We were triumphant.
translation.zh: ‎我们胜利了

translation.en: President Bush, the first President Bush,
translation.zh: ‎老布什总统就任时表示

translation.en: was inaugurating what was gonna be a new world order
translation.zh: ‎将会产生新的世界秩序

translation.en: that would spread democracy
translation.zh: ‎将西方自由国家的

translation.en: and the magnificence of the Western liberal state
translation.zh: ‎民主和伟大

translation.en: and capitalism throughout the world.
translation.zh: ‎以及资本主义传播到全世界

translation.en: So we weren't paying attention.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们忽略了一些事

translation.en: I mean, we were fixated on the world through our eyes.
translation.zh: ‎我们看世界的目光固定了下来

translation.en: One that was democratic, that was also materialistic as well.
translation.zh:
‎这是个民主的世界
‎也是个物质的世界

translation.en: We failed to understand and to comprehend the power of religion.
translation.zh: ‎我们无法理解和感受宗教的力量

translation.en: So we didn't understand what had happened in Afghanistan was not the closing act
translation.zh:
‎所以 当时的我们不知道
‎在阿富汗发生的一切并不是谢幕

translation.en: but a prelude to something far more serious and more consequential.
translation.zh:
‎而是一首序曲
‎揭开了某件更严重和有影响力的事件

translation.en: Especially after Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是当萨达姆·侯赛因
‎入侵科威特之后

translation.en: Iraq invaded Kuwait this morning,
translation.zh: ‎伊拉克今早入侵了科威特

translation.en: a perfectly executed invasion that caught the world by surprise.
translation.zh: ‎这次完美的入侵震惊了全世界

translation.en: The attack coming just hours
translation.zh: ‎袭击发生的数小时前

translation.en: after Iraq broke off talks with Kuwait over disputed oil fields.
translation.zh:
‎伊拉克刚刚和科威特
‎就争议油田问题中断了谈判

translation.en: [Hoffman] The United States and United Kingdom, amongst other countries,
translation.zh: ‎美国、英国以及其他国家

translation.en: immediately responded to Saddam Hussein and Iraq's invasion of Kuwait,
translation.zh:
‎立刻对萨达姆·侯赛因
‎和伊拉克入侵科威特作出反应

translation.en: by dispatching warships and ground forces to protect Saudi Arabia
translation.zh: ‎派遣战舰和地面部队保护沙特阿拉伯

translation.en: and to safeguard the rest of the Arabian Peninsula
translation.zh: ‎维护阿拉伯半岛其他地区安全

translation.en: from any attempt by Iraq to expand its control
translation.zh: ‎以防止伊拉克进一步染指

translation.en: over the world's oil supplies.
translation.zh: ‎对全球石油供应的控制

translation.en: [man] When I came to the FBI,
translation.zh: ‎我在联邦调查局的时候

translation.en: terrorist groups were something that I was studying.
translation.zh: ‎当时正在研究恐怖组织

translation.en: I was really interested in groups like Hamas, groups like Hezbollah,
translation.zh: ‎我对哈马斯、真主党之类的团体

translation.en: groups like PIJ, Palestinian Islamic Jihad.
translation.zh: ‎巴勒斯坦伊斯兰圣战组织

translation.en: And this weird guy who gives all these different interviews.
translation.zh: ‎以及那个四处接受采访的怪家伙

translation.en: [interviewer] What are your future plans?
translation.zh: ‎你未来有什么计划？

translation.en: [interpreter] You'll see them and hear about them in the media.
translation.zh:
‎你们将会在媒体上
‎看到并听说我们的计划

translation.en: God willing.
translation.zh: ‎真主保佑

translation.en: [Soufan] Who is he? What's his intention?
translation.zh: ‎他是谁？他的目的是什么？

translation.en: And when you talk to people in the US government at the time,
translation.zh: ‎如果当时你和美国政府的人谈起这事

translation.en: most of them tell you, "Ah, he's just a financier."
translation.zh:
‎大部分人都会跟你说
‎他只不过是个厨子人

translation.en: "He finances Islamic causes around the world."
translation.zh: ‎他资助了全球的伊斯兰事业

translation.en: But there was something more sinister to him.
translation.zh: ‎但他有更危险的东西

translation.en: Osama bin Laden had a lot of difficulties trying to explain to his followers
translation.zh:
‎奥萨马·本·拉登想要从宗教角度
‎向跟追随者们解释清楚

translation.en: his religious justification of fighting the United States.
translation.zh:
‎为什么要和美国开战
‎是一件非常困难的事情

translation.en: After all, the United States gave the mujahideen aid,
translation.zh: ‎说到底 美国向圣战者提供了帮助

translation.en: helped the Afghani people defeat the Soviet communists.
translation.zh: ‎帮助阿富汗人民打败了苏联共产党

translation.en: When Saddam Hussein invaded Kuwait,
translation.zh: ‎萨达姆·侯赛因入侵科威特

translation.en: it was a wake-up call for people like Osama bin Laden.
translation.zh:
‎对奥萨马·本·拉登这样的人来说
‎像是一记警钟

translation.en: They said, "See? We told you."
translation.zh:
‎他们说：
‎“看到了吗？我们早说过了”

translation.en: "The United States wanted to invade Muslim lands."
translation.zh: ‎“美国想要入侵穆斯林的土地

translation.en: "They wanted to invade the lands of the two holy places,
translation.zh: ‎他们想入侵这片拥有两座圣地的土地

translation.en: to steal the oil and steal the wealth of the Muslims."
translation.zh: ‎偷走石油 偷走穆斯林的财富”

translation.en: [Hoffman] This solidified in Osama bin Laden's mind
translation.zh: ‎奥萨马·本·拉登深深地相信

translation.en: that the United States was no different from the Soviet Union
translation.zh: ‎美国和苏联没有区别

translation.en: and was, through the ruse of protecting Saudi Arabia,
translation.zh: ‎美国是想通过保护沙特阿拉伯的诡计

translation.en: attempting to subjugate Muslim peoples
translation.zh: ‎企图征服穆斯林人民

translation.en: and also to seize control of the Muslims' most precious natural resource:
translation.zh: ‎并控制穆斯林最珍贵的自然资源

translation.en: its oil and natural gas reserves in that region of the world.
translation.zh: ‎以及这片土地上的石油和天然气储备

translation.en: He portrayed himself as the lone man,
translation.zh: ‎他把自己塑造成孤独的人

translation.en: the person deeply devoted to his religion
translation.zh: ‎深深地投身于宗教之中

translation.en: who was standing up against this cultural tide of homogeneity,
translation.zh: ‎他反对同质性的文化潮流

translation.en: of Western influence and dominance, and saying, "Enough!"
translation.zh:
‎反对西方的影响力和控制
‎大喊：“够了！”

translation.en: "We have our own beliefs, our own way of living,
translation.zh:
‎“我们有自己的信仰
‎自己的生活方式

translation.en: and we reject that, and you are trying to impose it on us."
translation.zh:
‎我们拒绝接受
‎你们是在强迫我们”

translation.en: "Therefore, we have no choice but to fight and to strike back."
translation.zh:
‎“因此 我们别无选择
‎只能战斗和反击”

translation.en: [Soufan] He decided to declare jihad on the United States.
translation.zh: ‎他决定向美国发动圣战

translation.en: He thought that this is his opportunity to wake up the Muslim world,
translation.zh:
‎他认为这是一次
‎唤醒穆斯林世界的机会

translation.en: and they need to start thinking about defeating the other remaining superpower.
translation.zh: ‎他们开始考虑 ‎另一个剩下的超级大国

translation.en: [David Dinkins] At approximately 12:15 p.m.
translation.zh: ‎大约在中午12点15分

translation.en: there was a large explosion at the World Trade Center,
translation.zh: ‎世界贸易中心北塔地库停车场

translation.en: which caused the collapse of several floors
translation.zh: ‎发生巨大爆炸

translation.en: in the basement of the parking level beneath Tower One.
translation.zh: ‎导致大楼多层坍塌

translation.en: [reporter] They stream from the stairway by the hundreds.
translation.zh: ‎成百上千的人从楼梯处涌出

translation.en: The joyful end of a two-hour journey down the smoke-filled staircase,
translation.zh:
‎这些人沿着烟雾弥漫的楼梯
‎经过两个小时的疏散走了出来

translation.en: staggering, coughing.
translation.zh: ‎步履蹒跚并咳嗽着

translation.en: Five are known dead at this point, more than 200 hurt in the blast
translation.zh:
‎目前已知本次爆炸案
‎导致了五人丧生 两百余人受伤

translation.en: that rocked the nation's second tallest building.
translation.zh: ‎晃动了这座全国的第二高楼

translation.en: [Hoffman] The first World Trade Center bombing was really independent of al-Qaeda,
translation.zh:
‎虽然基地组织在当时已成立五年
‎但世界贸易中心的第一次爆炸案

translation.en: even though al-Qaeda had been formed five years before.
translation.zh: ‎的确不是由基地组织负责策划的

translation.en: That's not to say it was completely unconnected to al-Qaeda.
translation.zh:
‎这并不意味着
‎整件事完全与基地组织无关

translation.en: Al-Qaeda was not involved in any active sense.
translation.zh:
‎尽管基地组织
‎并没有积极参与这次行动

translation.en: Al-Qaeda, at that stage, was still plotting and planning.
translation.zh: ‎但当时的基地组织正在盘算和策划

translation.en: It was an operation carried out by acolytes or followers
translation.zh: ‎那次行动的执行人是

translation.en: of the Blind Sheikh, Abdel-Rahman,
translation.zh: ‎盲人谢赫阿卜杜勒·拉赫曼的追随者

translation.en: who bin Laden counted as one of his spiritual mentors as well.
translation.zh: ‎他被本·拉登视为精神导师之一

translation.en: [Soufan] Omar Abdel-Rahman,
translation.zh: ‎奥马尔·阿卜杜勒·拉赫曼

translation.en: he was able to escape Egypt and come to the United States,
translation.zh: ‎他设法从埃及逃跑并来到美国

translation.en: because people in the US government believed that this guy is on our side.
translation.zh: ‎美国政府相信他是自己人

translation.en: This guy fought against the Soviets, helped to defeat the Soviets.
translation.zh:
‎这个人跟苏联人打过仗
‎并协助打败了苏联人

translation.en: So there is no way he is gonna have any animosity towards the United States.
translation.zh: ‎因此他不可能对美国存有敌意

translation.en: They were wrong.
translation.zh: ‎他们错了

translation.en: [Hoffman] We know that Ramzi Ahmed Yousef,
translation.zh: ‎据了解拉姆齐·阿哈穆德·尤塞夫

translation.en: the mastermind behind the 1993 bombing of the World Trade Center,
translation.zh:
‎是1993年世界贸易中心爆炸案的
‎幕后黑手

translation.en: had sought to topple one tower onto the other
translation.zh: ‎他想将一栋楼推倒至另一栋上

translation.en: with a view of killing 60,000 people.
translation.zh: ‎预计杀害60000人

translation.en: He was thinking on a vastly different scale
translation.zh: ‎他想着要创造一个非常巨大规模

translation.en: than terrorists had thought before.
translation.zh: ‎超越之前所有恐怖分子的事件

translation.en: And so was his uncle, Khalid Sheikh Mohammed.
translation.zh:
‎他的舅父谢赫·穆罕默德
‎也这么想

translation.en: [Soufan] At the very beginning, Khalid Sheikh Mohammed
translation.zh:
‎一开始的时候 ‎哈立德·谢赫·穆罕默德
‎真的想要炸倒世界贸易中心

translation.en: really wanted the World Trade Center down.
translation.zh:
‎哈立德·谢赫·穆罕默德
‎真的想要炸倒世界贸易中心

translation.en: Ramzi Yousef, his relative, when he got caught,
translation.zh: ‎抓住拉姆齐·尤塞夫和他的亲戚时

translation.en: they put him on a helicopter, bringing him to New York so he can go to jail.
translation.zh: ‎当局用直升飞机将他送到纽约坐牢

translation.en: They showed him the World Trade Center
translation.zh: ‎他们向他展示了世界贸易中心

translation.en: and they said, "See? It's still up."
translation.zh: ‎说：“看到了？还立着呢”

translation.en: And he said, "If I had more money, it won't be."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“如果我的钱再多些
‎它就立不住了”

translation.en: [Hoffman] What underscored, I think, how serious the 1993 World Trade Center attack was,
translation.zh:
‎我觉得当时低估了
‎1993年世贸中心袭击案的严重性

translation.en: was the fact that it was not an isolated one-off phenomenon.
translation.zh: ‎事实上这并不是一个孤立的现象

translation.en: Because the following June, in June 1993, another plot was uncovered.
translation.zh:
‎之后的六月 1993年6月
‎又一桩策划案被揭露

translation.en: [man] Most of my career, I was an NCIS special agent.
translation.zh:
‎我的大部分职业生涯
‎都就职于海军罪案调查处

translation.en: Went through the ranks up to the deputy assistant director level.
translation.zh: ‎并一路升到副处长

translation.en: And in that capacity, my primary responsibility
translation.zh: ‎当时我主要的工作是

translation.en: was threat warnings for the Navy, Marine Corps.
translation.zh: ‎向海军部和海军陆战队预警威胁

translation.en: The cell that I was working against
translation.zh: ‎我当时跟着的一组人

translation.en: was seeking to assassinate Hosni Mubarak, the president of Egypt,
translation.zh:
‎正试图刺杀
‎埃及总统胡斯尼·穆巴拉克

translation.en: and blow up the Holland and Lincoln tunnels, plant bombs in those tunnels.
translation.zh:
‎并通过安置爆炸物
‎炸毁荷兰和林肯隧道

translation.en: They were going to shoot the guards at the federal building,
translation.zh: ‎他们打算向联邦大厦警卫开枪

translation.en: 26 Federal Plaza,
translation.zh: ‎联邦广场26号

translation.en: drive a truck underneath with explosives in it to blow up the Federal Building…
translation.zh:
‎驾驶一辆装有爆炸物的卡车
‎炸毁联邦大厦

translation.en: and looking at other landmarks in New York City to attack us.
translation.zh: ‎并寻找纽约的其他地标建筑进行袭击

translation.en: [reporter] Members of a joint terrorism task force seized barrels of evidence
translation.zh:
‎一小撮联合恐怖分子
‎在今天上午被当局缴获大量证据

translation.en: and arrested eight people in New York and New Jersey.
translation.zh: ‎有八个人在纽约和新泽西被抓捕

translation.en: The suspects are said to be linked to Sheikh Omar Abdel Rahman.
translation.zh: ‎据说嫌犯与阿卜杜勒·拉赫曼有关

translation.en: [Soufan] They took the cell down at the last minute.
translation.zh: ‎恐怖分子在最后时刻被拿下

translation.en: And there is CCTV videos that were put on trial as evidence, as exhibits.
translation.zh: ‎这段监控视频在审判中被当作证据

translation.en: And you see one guy praying…
translation.zh: ‎你能看到有一个人在祈祷

translation.en: and next to him, one guy literally mixing the bomb.
translation.zh: ‎他的旁边另一个人在搅炸药

translation.en: So they stopped them at the last minute.
translation.zh: ‎最后时刻 这些人被制止住了

translation.en: [Fallon] We wound up bringing to justice ten suspects.
translation.zh: ‎我们最终将十名嫌犯绳之以法

translation.en: [Soufan] The FBI and other folks in the intelligence community
translation.zh: ‎联邦调查局和其他情报人员

translation.en: start focusing on this jihadi threat.
translation.zh: ‎开始关注圣战的威胁

translation.en: And Osama bin Laden, by then, was based in Sudan.
translation.zh: ‎奥萨马·本·拉登当时的窝点在苏丹

translation.en: He was openly declaring jihad and declaring war on the United States.
translation.zh: ‎他公开发动圣战并向美国宣战

translation.en: [Bearden] The Sudanese come to the Americans, say, "You want him?"
translation.zh:
‎苏丹人来找美国人说：
‎“你们想要他吗？”

translation.en: And we said, "We don't have enough on him to do anything, so no, we don't want him."
translation.zh:
‎我们说：“我们没有足够证据拿下他
‎所以不 我们不想要他”

translation.en: The Sudanese then came and said, "How about he goes to Afghanistan?
translation.zh:
‎然后 苏丹人过来说：
‎“那让他去阿富汗怎么样？”

translation.en: And the Saudis and Americans said…
translation.zh: ‎沙特人和美国人说：

translation.en: "What a wonderful idea!"
translation.zh: ‎“好主意！”

translation.en: "That's so far away. What kind of trouble can he get into there?"
translation.zh: ‎“那么远 他能惹出什么麻烦？”

translation.en: [Bearden] After we left Afghanistan in 1989,
translation.zh: ‎1989年 我们离开了阿富汗

translation.en: all of those parties that we dealt with,
translation.zh: ‎所有那些我们曾来往过的党派

translation.en: the Seven Sisters, began jockeying for position.
translation.zh: ‎七党联盟开始抢夺地盘

translation.en: In effect, we walked away.
translation.zh: ‎实际上 我们走开了

translation.en: There was probably no thought given
translation.zh: ‎很可能当时没有考虑到

translation.en: to aftercare in the case of a victory,
translation.zh: ‎胜利之后的善后问题

translation.en: and it was a failed state.
translation.zh: ‎那个状态不对

translation.en: [Rashid] And so what we saw was the withdrawal of the Soviets in '89,
translation.zh: ‎因此我们看到1989年苏联撤离

translation.en: and with no political settlement inside Afghanistan,
translation.zh:
‎阿富汗内部政治问题
‎并没有得到解决

translation.en: it immediately led to the civil war.
translation.zh: ‎还立刻引发了内战

translation.en: Kabul was utterly destroyed in the civil war.
translation.zh: ‎喀布尔在内战中被彻底摧毁

translation.en: [Soufan] When he went to Afghanistan,
translation.zh: ‎本·拉登去阿富汗的时候

translation.en: there was a new group in Afghanistan that was winning the battle
translation.zh:
‎苏联人撤离后
‎当时有个新的阿富汗组织

translation.en: that took place after the Soviets pull out among all the mujahideen
translation.zh:
‎在所有的圣战者中
‎在各种不同的军阀混战中

translation.en: and all the different warlords.
translation.zh: ‎赢得胜利

translation.en: That group was called the Taliban.
translation.zh: ‎那个组织叫做塔利班

translation.en: [Rashid] They emerged as this force which would do good,
translation.zh:
‎这支武装力量的出现
‎像是要做善事

translation.en: and do better, and bring peace to Afghanistan,
translation.zh: ‎发展强大 为阿富汗带来和平

translation.en: which essentially, in the beginning, they did.
translation.zh: ‎刚开始的时候 他们是做到了

translation.en: Because when they came to Kandahar, they drove out all the petty warlords.
translation.zh:
‎因为当他们到达坎大哈时
‎他们赶走了所有的小军阀

translation.en: [man] Afghanistan in the 1990s was-- It's hard to describe.
translation.zh:
‎20世纪90年代的阿富汗…
‎很难形容

translation.en: It was another world. It was completely and utterly destroyed.
translation.zh:
‎那是另一个世界
‎它被彻彻底底地摧毁了

translation.en: The Taliban didn't let foreigners in very often.
translation.zh: ‎塔利班很少让外国人进入

translation.en: I got lucky. I got a visa and I drove in. I drove to the capital.
translation.zh:
‎我很幸运 拿到了签证开车过去
‎我开车来到首都

translation.en: All the roads are blown up, cratered.
translation.zh: ‎所有的道路都被炸毁了 满是坑洞

translation.en: There are Soviet armored vehicles,
translation.zh: ‎到处都是苏联的装甲车

translation.en: tanks overturned, broken, rusty everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎翻过来的坦克 四处凋敝破百

translation.en: Like, all along the road to Kabul.
translation.zh: ‎一直到喀布尔的路上都这样

translation.en: You know, the war had ended ten years before and nobody cleaned it up.
translation.zh:
‎战争十年前就结束了
‎却没有人清理这里

translation.en: I went to my hotel. The windows were gone.
translation.zh: ‎我去了酒店 没有窗户

translation.en: There was no running water. There was no electricity.
translation.zh:
‎那里没有自来水
‎那里没有电

translation.en: You just didn't see women.
translation.zh: ‎你看不见女人

translation.en: Women were not allowed to walk unaccompanied…
translation.zh: ‎那里不允许女人独自上街

translation.en: you know, either by their husband or a male member of their family, alone.
translation.zh: ‎必须由丈夫或家族男性成员陪同

translation.en: And so occasionally you would see a woman,
translation.zh: ‎所以偶尔看到一个女人

translation.en: and if she were outside, she had a head-to-toe burqa on
translation.zh:
‎如果她在外面
‎会穿从头到脚的长袍

translation.en: so you couldn't see her face.
translation.zh: ‎不让人看到她的脸

translation.en: And girls were banned from going to school.
translation.zh: ‎不准女孩上学

translation.en: The Taliban were kind of the meanest, toughest guys in town.
translation.zh: ‎塔利班是城里最凶狠的人

translation.en: They brought the civil war to an end,
translation.zh: ‎他们结束了内战

translation.en: but they had imposed this kind of draconian,
translation.zh: ‎但是他们给社会带来的

translation.en: medieval kind of peace on the society.
translation.zh: ‎是严厉又原始的和平

translation.en: The first night I got there,
translation.zh: ‎我在那里的第一个晚上

translation.en: there was a knock on my door from one of the Taliban guys, and he said,
translation.zh: ‎有一个塔利班的人来敲我的门说：

translation.en: "We would like you to come tomorrow to an amputation and an execution."
translation.zh: ‎“我们想让你明天去看截肢和处决”

translation.en: So I and a couple other reporters, we went to the Kabul sports stadium,
translation.zh:
‎所以 我和其他几个记者
‎去了喀布尔的体育馆

translation.en: and they brought us down to the midfield on the soccer field.
translation.zh: ‎他们把我们带到足球场的中场

translation.en: I mean, the amputation was a kind of warm-up act,
translation.zh: ‎截肢是一种热身行为

translation.en: and they did that, and cut off the guy's hand
translation.zh:
‎他们就那么下手了
‎当着所有人的面

translation.en: right in front of everybody.
translation.zh: ‎砍下了一个人的手

translation.en: But then they brought the guy in to be executed,
translation.zh: ‎然后 他们把要处决的那个人带进来

translation.en: and it was, you know, it was like-- It was like something out of a nightmare.
translation.zh: ‎简直像是一场噩梦

translation.en: He was blindfolded. They set him on midfield.
translation.zh: ‎他被蒙上眼睛带到了中场

translation.en: He apparently had murdered someone in an irrigation dispute.
translation.zh: ‎他应该是在一场水利纠纷中杀了人

translation.en: The family of the victim was there.
translation.zh: ‎受害者的家人们在那里

translation.en: His family was there.
translation.zh: ‎他的家人在那里

translation.en: And his family, they were sobbing and they were begging for mercy.
translation.zh: ‎他的家人在啜泣 在求情

translation.en: "Please spare him. Please spare him."
translation.zh: ‎“请放过他”

translation.en: And the family of the victim was saying, "No, no, no."
translation.zh: ‎受害者家属说：“不”

translation.en: And the Taliban handed a rifle to the brother of the victim.
translation.zh:
‎塔利班将一把步枪
‎递给受害人的兄弟

translation.en: And he walked out to midfield,
translation.zh: ‎他走到中场

translation.en: and all the while they're reading the Qur'an into a loudspeaker.
translation.zh: ‎整个过程中扬声器都在放《古兰经》

translation.en: The brother takes the rifle and shoots the guy.
translation.zh:
‎受害人的兄弟拿着步枪
‎朝那个人开枪

translation.en: I mean, he kind of falls over, they cart him off, and that was it.
translation.zh:
‎然后他倒了下去
‎他们把他带走 就这样了

translation.en: And that's what it was like there.
translation.zh: ‎这就是那里的写照

translation.en: [man, in Dari] The rule of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan in Afghanistan
translation.zh:
‎阿富汗伊斯兰酋长国
‎在阿富汗的统治

translation.en: lasted almost for about seven years from beginning to end.
translation.zh: ‎从头到尾差不多维持了七年

translation.en: The people of Afghanistan have some good memories of that period.
translation.zh:
‎阿富汗人民
‎对那段时期有一些美好的回忆

translation.en: I personally have the memory of security in my mind.
translation.zh:
‎（贾拉勒丁·辛瓦里
‎前塔利班领导人） ‎我个人觉得有安全感

translation.en: Security prevailed throughout Afghanistan.
translation.zh: ‎阿富汗各地都很安全

translation.en: Certainly no Afghan could have killed another person at that time,
translation.zh:
‎那时候没有阿富汗人
‎会因为个人恩怨

translation.en: because of their personal animosities.
translation.zh: ‎去杀掉另一个人

translation.en: [reporter] The Muslim extremists, known as the Taliban militia,
translation.zh:
‎穆斯林极端分子
‎又被称为塔利班民兵

translation.en: have not only trampled on women's rights and banned most modern pleasures…
translation.zh:
‎不仅践踏了女性的权利
‎废除了大部分的现代娱乐

translation.en: since taking over most of Afghanistan, they have made it a haven
translation.zh:
‎他们在控制了阿富汗的大部分地区后
‎还将这里变成了

translation.en: for some of the world's most dangerous terrorists.
translation.zh: ‎世界上最危险的恐怖分子的避风港

translation.en: [Rashid] Osama bin Laden had done a great deal for their ostensible leader, Mullah Omar,
translation.zh:
‎奥萨马·本·拉登为名义上的领导人
‎毛拉·奥马尔做了很多事情

translation.en: in strengthening Mullah Omar's position.
translation.zh: ‎巩固毛拉·奥马尔的地位

translation.en: Now what, of course, Mullah Omar may have made him promise to do
translation.zh: ‎当然 毛拉·奥马尔让他承诺

translation.en: was not to launch any attack on the Americans from Afghan soil.
translation.zh:
‎不要在阿富汗领土上
‎向美国人发动袭击

translation.en: It was well known that Osama wouldn't be sitting idly by doing nothing.
translation.zh:
‎众人皆知
‎奥萨马不会无所事事就这么呆着

translation.en: [Hoffman] On the eighth anniversary of the deployment
translation.zh: ‎在美国派遣第一支军队

translation.en: of the first US troops to Saudi Arabia,
translation.zh: ‎进入沙特阿拉伯八周年之际

translation.en: bin Laden launched simultaneous attacks against the US embassies in East Africa.
translation.zh:
‎本·拉登同时攻击了
‎多处美国在东非地区的大使馆

translation.en: [Hoffman] The fact they were simultaneous attacks just ratcheted up that threat
translation.zh:
‎他们同时发动多起袭击
‎只是为了强调

translation.en: that terrorists could strike at more than one place at one time.
translation.zh: ‎恐怖分子可以一次袭击多地

translation.en: [Bill Clinton] These acts of terrorist violence are abhorrent. They are inhuman.
translation.zh: ‎这些恐怖暴力行为让人厌恶 不人道

translation.en: We will use all the means at our disposal…
translation.zh: ‎我们会用尽一切办法

translation.en: to bring those responsible to justice…
translation.zh: ‎将肇事者绳之以法

translation.en: no matter what, or how long it takes.
translation.zh: ‎不惜代价 无论多久

translation.en: [Soufan] We knew that al-Qaeda is not just going to pack and go home.
translation.zh:
‎我们知道基地组织
‎不会只是打包行李回家

translation.en: They're going to try to do something else.
translation.zh: ‎他们还会试着做别的事情

translation.en: We had intelligence that said they were planning
translation.zh: ‎据情报显示他们正在策划

translation.en: to bomb a few hotels in Jordan.
translation.zh: ‎轰炸约旦的几家酒店

translation.en: Also, they were planning to assassinate the Pope, John Paul II,
translation.zh:
‎而且他们还计划
‎暗杀教皇约翰·保罗二世

translation.en: when he was doing baptism on the Jordan River,
translation.zh: ‎那时候他正在约旦河参加洗礼

translation.en: and attack pilgrims coming from Israel to Jordan on the land border.
translation.zh: ‎并袭击以色列和约旦边界的朝圣者

translation.en: So that was a huge plot, and literally we took the whole cell down.
translation.zh:
‎所以 那是一个巨大的阴谋
‎我们把整个窝点都端掉了

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you expect, worry, that there will be an incident of terrorism
translation.zh: ‎你会担心新年之前

translation.en: before the first of the year?
translation.zh: ‎发生恐怖主义事件吗？

translation.en: We are on a heightened state of alert, and we're doing a lot of work on this.
translation.zh:
‎我们处于高度戒备状态
‎正在为此做很多工作

translation.en: But I would say to the American people
translation.zh: ‎但是我想告诉美国人民

translation.en: they should go on about their business and celebrate the holidays as they would.
translation.zh: ‎去做自己的事情 庆祝节日吧

translation.en: [anchor] Pentagon officials tell NBC News that at least four US sailors were killed,
translation.zh:
‎五角大楼官员
‎向全国广播公司表示 ‎一名自杀式炸弹袭击者
‎袭击了美国海军驱逐舰科尔号

translation.en: and as many as 30 more wounded
translation.zh:
‎一名自杀式炸弹袭击者
‎袭击了美国海军驱逐舰科尔号

translation.en: when a suicide bomber attacked the US Navy Destroyer USS Cole.
translation.zh:
‎导致了至少四名美国海员丧生
‎并有30多人受伤

translation.en: [Fallon] A small boat, a skiff,
translation.zh: ‎一艘小船 一艘小艇

translation.en: with two al-Qaeda members in it, came about midship of the USS Cole,
translation.zh:
‎上面有两个基地组织成员
‎靠近科尔号驱逐舰船体中部

translation.en: when it was at a fuel dolphin in Aden, Yemen.
translation.zh: ‎当时船只正在也门的亚丁湾补充燃料

translation.en: Midship is about the midway point,
translation.zh: ‎船体中部的中间位置

translation.en: which happened to be where the cafeteria was.
translation.zh: ‎碰巧是餐厅所在点

translation.en: A huge explosion, it did quite a bit of damage,
translation.zh: ‎巨大的爆炸造成了严重的破坏

translation.en: and 17 sailors were killed that day in Aden, Yemen.
translation.zh:
‎当天在也门的亚丁湾
‎17名海员死亡

translation.en: The system was already blinking red that summer with threat warnings.
translation.zh:
‎伴随着那个夏天的威胁警告
‎整个系统高度警备起来

translation.en: We were anticipating some type of attack somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎我们预料到
‎某处会发生某种形式的攻击

translation.en: We didn't know in what form it would come. We didn't know where it would be.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道它会以什么形式出现
‎我们不知道会发生在哪里

translation.en: You're getting so much data.
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了很多消息

translation.en: So, you know, if you get one thread of intel,
translation.zh: ‎如果只得到一线情报

translation.en: it could be an anomaly, could be fabricated, could be false,
translation.zh:
‎可能会是异常
‎可能会是捏造和虚假的

translation.en: could be some overheard conversation,
translation.zh: ‎可能是只言片语的对话

translation.en: and it might not be validated.
